TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlWriterTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将跟踪或调试输出作为 XML 编码的数据定向到 或 （如 ）。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output as XML-encoded data to a or to a , such as a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您必须具有非托管代码权限才能创建类的实例。You must have unmanaged code permission to create an instance of the class. 类将跟踪和调试信息转换为 XML 编码的文本流。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 下面的表显示了 XML 输出的说明。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables that follow. 您可以使用[服务跟踪查看器工具 (svctraceviewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)来显示 XML 输出。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the XML output. 你可以通过应用程序配置文件启用或禁用, 然后在你的应用程序中使用配置的。You can enable or disable an through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者, 您可以在代码中创建。Alternately, you can create an in your code. 若要配置, 请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To configure an , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中, 可以添加或删除侦听器, 设置侦听器的属性, 或删除侦听器。In this file, you can add or remove a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove listeners. 配置文件的格式应与下面的示例类似。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ```xml ``` 类从基类 继承属性。 The class inherits the property from the base class . 属性允许侦听器上的其他级别的跟踪输出筛选。The property allows an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果存在筛选器, 则跟踪侦听器`Trace`的方法将调用筛选器的方法来确定是否发出跟踪。If there is a filter present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. > [!NOTE] > 如果尝试写入正在使用或不可用的文件, 则该文件名将自动以 GUID 为前缀。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 侦听器方法旨在由、 和类的方法调用。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 侦听器方法不应在应用程序代码中直接调用。The listener methods are not intended to be called directly from application code. 侦听器主要供类使用。 The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 和方法可由和类调用,并且为不提供值的XML元素提供默认值。 The and methods can be called by the and classes, and default values are provided for the XML elements that and do not supply values for. 下表介绍了 XML 输出的元素和属性。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|特性Attributes|OutputOutput|说明Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|NoneNone|取决于属性中是否存在该标志。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字符 (如 > 或 <) 将替换为转义序列。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 请参阅后面的转义字符转换表。See the escaped character translation table that follows.| |`Computer`|NoneNone|始终存在。Always present.| 属性的值。The value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|始终存在Always present|如果未指定, 则默认值为空 GUID。If not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取决于跟踪方法调用中`relatedActivityId`是否存在参数。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the Trace method call.| 方法的 `relatedActivityId` 参数。The `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`DataItem`|NoneNone|取决于方法的参数。`data`Depends on the `data` parameter of the method.|此元素可以包含元素数组或一个元素, 因此, 这些值将作为一组`DataItem`节点`TraceData`在元素下写入。This element can contain an array of elements or one element, so the values are written as a set of `DataItem` nodes under the `TraceData` element.

数据输出使用`ToString`传入的数据对象的方法。The data output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`EventID`|NoneNone|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入 (`id`)。Parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessName`|始终存在。Always present.|中的。From the .| ||`ProcessID`|始终存在。Always present.|中的。From the . 在 Windows 98 和 windows Me 操作系统上, 如果`ProcessID`大于 2147483647, 则它是负数的正表示形式, 应转换为获取正确的进程标识符。On Windows 98 and Windows Me operating systems, if `ProcessID` is greater than 2,147,483,647 it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|始终存在。Always present.|中的。From the .| |`Level`|NoneNone|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入 (的数值`eventType`)。Parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 大于255的参数值输出为255。Parameter values greater than 255 are output as 255.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|NoneNone|取决于属性中是否存在该标志。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|可以有多个逻辑操作, 因此, 这些值将作为`LogicalOperation`节点下的`LogicalOperationStack`元素写入。There can be more than one logical operation, so the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`Message`|NoneNone|取决于跟踪方法调用中是否存在消息。Depends on the presence of a message in the Trace method call.|如果提供了格式设置参数, 则此元素是已格式化的消息。This element is a formatted message if formatting arguments are provided.| |`Source`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入。Parameter input.| |`SubType`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入。Parameter input.| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|始终存在。Always present.|如果中不存在, 则默认为当前时间。If not present in the , the default is the current time.| |`TimeStamp`|NoneNone|取决于属性中是否存在该标志。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|中的。From the .| |`Type`|NoneNone|始终存在。Always present.|始终为值3。Always the value 3.| 下表显示了在 XML 输出中转义的字符。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 转义`DataItem`发生在除元素之外的所有元素和属性中, 如果传递`data`给该方法的参数的对象是一个对象, 则不会对其进行转义。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes with the exception of the `DataItem` element, which is not escaped if the object passed to the `data` parameter of the method is an object. 如果用于数据对象 , 则调用方法, 并将整个根节点视为非转义数据。 If an is used for the data object, the method is called and the entire root node is traced as unescaped data. |转义字符Escaped character|值Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#xD;&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#xA;&\#xA;| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类将转义和非转义的数据写入文件日志。The following code example shows the use of the class to write both escaped and non-escaped data to file logs. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/VB/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 编码为指定路径上的指定文件初始化类的新实例。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果文件存在, 则将其追加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果该文件不存在, 则创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少异常的几率, 任何可能使输出无效的字符都将替换为 "？" 字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 将属性初始化为空字符串 ("")。The property is initialized to an empty string ("").

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, using the specified stream as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `name`参数`name` 为`null`, 则此构造函数将属性初始化为参数值或空字符串 ("")。This constructor initializes the property to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 该名称可用作集合中的索引, 以编程方式更改侦听器的属性。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如, 下面的代码将设置 其属性为 "xmlListener" 的实例的属性。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 编码为指定路径上的指定文件初始化类的新实例。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果文件存在, 则将其追加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果该文件不存在, 则创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少异常的几率, 任何可能使输出无效的字符都将替换为 "？" 字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 如果 `name`参数为`name` ,则将属性设置为参数值或空字符串("")。`null`The property is set to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 该名称可用作集合中的索引, 以编程方式更改侦听器的属性。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如, 下面的代码将设置 其属性为 "xmlListener" 的实例的属性。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp. ```

summary.span: 关闭该侦听器的 ，以使其不再接收跟踪或调试输出。

span.span: Writes trace information including an error message and a detailed error message to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序在用户界面模式下运行时, 默认行为是在消息框中显示消息和详细消息, 并将其显示到 集合中的实例。The default behavior is to display the message and detailed message in a message box when the application is running in user-interface mode, and to the instances in the collection. 默认情况下, 集合包含的实例。By default, the collection contains an instance of . 可以通过在集合中添加或删除来自定义此行为。You can customize this behavior by adding or removing a from the collection.

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、、和参数`id`在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。 `source` `eventCache` `eventType`The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在`id`写入之前, 将参数转换为无符号整数, 因此负值`id`将被写入为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 参数作为节点写入`TraceData`元素中。 `DataItem` `data`The `data` parameter is written as a `DataItem` node in the `TraceData` element. 数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。 `ToString`The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由、 和类的方法调用, 用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, data objects, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、、和参数`id`在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。 `source` `eventCache` `eventType`The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在`id`写入之前, 将参数转换为无符号整数, 因此负值`id`将被写入为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data`参数数组中的对象作为`DataItem` `TraceData`元素中的节点写入。The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `DataItem` nodes in the `TraceData` element. 每`ToString`个数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由、 和类的方法调用, 用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、、和参数`id`在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。 `source` `eventCache` `eventType`The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在`id`写入之前, 将参数转换为无符号整数, 因此负值`id`将被写入为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message` 参数`Message`作为元素写入。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由、 和类的方法调用, 用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.

param.name: format
param.span: 包含零个或多个格式项的格式字符串，这些项与 数组中的对象相对应。

span.span: A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the array.

param.name: args

span.span: An object array containing zero or more objects to format.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、格式化消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、、和参数`id`在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。 `source` `eventCache` `eventType`The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在`id`写入之前, 将参数转换为无符号整数, 因此负值`id`将被写入为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `format` `args` `args`调用方法, 将字符串和数组作为参数传递, 以将对象数组`Message`的格式设置为元素。 The method is called, passing in the `format` string and `args` array as parameters, to format the `args` object array as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由、 和类的方法调用, 用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceTransfer (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, int id, string message, Guid relatedActivityId);

Public Overrides Sub TraceTransfer (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, id As Integer, message As String, relatedActivityId As Guid)
public: override void TraceTransfer(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, int id, System::String ^ message, Guid relatedActivityId);
override this.TraceTransfer : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * int * string * Guid -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A trace message to write.

param.name: relatedActivityId
param.span: 标识相关活动的 结构。

span.span: A structure that identifies a related activity.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息（包括相关活动的标识）、消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于关联相关跟踪。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. 、、和参数`relatedActivityId`在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。 `source` `eventCache` `id`The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在`id`写入之前, 将参数转换为无符号整数, 因此负值`id`将被写入为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message` 参数`Message`作为元素写入。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. 调用方法将`relatedActivityId`值转换为标头中显示的 "B" 格式字符串。 The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId`value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. 页脚`SubTypeName`中的元素将跟踪事件类型标识为。The `SubTypeName` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它旨在由对象调用, 以便为其方法发出跟踪信息。It is intended to be called by a object to emit the trace information for its method.

span.span: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法在日志输出中包含上下文信息。Use the method to include context information in the log output.
